summary: The University of Miami, located in Coral Gables, Florida, is a private research university with over 19,000 students. It offers hundreds of undergraduate, master's, and doctoral programs across various fields, including medicine, law, and marine science. The main campus spans 240 acres and is about 7 miles from downtown Miami. With annual research expenditures of $456 million, it's one of the largest research universities in the nation. The university has a successful athletic program, known as the Miami Hurricanes, with multiple national championships in football and baseball. It's also home to four Nobel Prize recipients and is a member of the Association of American Universities.
title: University of Miami
